greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Mertens's function of the arithmetic derivative of n: a(n) = M(n'), a(1) = 0.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
mathematica: Array[Total@ Map[MoebiusMu, Range@ If[Abs@ # < 2, 0, # Total[#2/#1 & @@@ FactorInteger[Abs@ #]]]] &, 89] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Nov 01 2017 *)
program: (PARI) rd(n) = {local(fac); if(n<1, 0, fac=factor(n); sum(i=1, matsize(fac)[1], n*fac[i, 2]/fac[i, 1];));}
A003415(n) = { my(fac); if(n<1, 0, fac=factor(n); sum(i=1, matsize(fac)[1], n*fac[i, 2]/fac[i, 1]))}; \\ From _Michael B. Porter_, Nov 25 2009
results.author: _Luca Brigada Villa_, Sep 24 2013
ext: Description and formula clarified and more terms added by _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 01 2017
